Internet share of total advertising expenditure
Internet share of all advertising spend (%)

Note: Data do not include mobile advertising, a small but growing new market. This is particularly relevant to Japan where in 2011 mobile advertising accounted for approximately 3.5% of total advertising expenditure. * Data prior to 2009 exclude paid-for search advertising. Internet data from 2009 include display, classified, search and email and are not comparable with those of previous years.
